vote.title: To recognize the partnership between the Commission on Black Girls and Eryn PiNK Girl Empowerment to improve the quality of life of Black Girls and celebrate October 11, 2022, as the International Day of the Girl in the City of Columbus.
vote.description:
Title
To recognize the partnership between the Commission on Black Girls and Eryn PiNK Girl Empowerment to improve the quality of life of Black Girls and celebrate October 11, 2022, as the International Day of the Girl in the City of Columbus. 
 
Body
WHEREAS, the International Day of the Girl highlights the gender inequality that can begin for girls in their early adolescence with disparities appearing in the ability to access education, medical care and nutritional guidance as well as be protected from  discrimination, forced child marriage and violence against women; and  
 
WHEREAS, The United Nations General Assembly adopted Resolution 66/170 on December 19, 2011 declaring October 11th as the International Day of the Girl, recognizing the rights of girls and the unique challenges facing girls globally; and  
 
WHEREAS, The International Day of the Girl encourages the empowerment of girls and ensuring their basic rights to freedom, as well as protecting their human rights; and 
 
WHEREAS, On July 16, 2018, Columbus City Council adopted resolution 0208X-2018 to create the Commission on Black Girls with a focus on changing the life trajectory of Black women by creating opportunities for Black girls; and 
 
WHEREAS, In honor of International Day of the Girl, Columbus City Council acknowledges the mission of the Eryn PiNK Girl Empowerment program of ICE Mentors to empower youth to live purposeful lives and thrive; additionally, the Eryn Pink Girl Empowerment programs are aligned with the work of the Commission on Black Girls; and  
 
WHEREAS, The Commission on Black Girls and Eryn PiNK Girl Empowerment will come together for a week-long celebration of International Day of the Girl leading up to the 10th Annual Give That Girl the Mic; Columbus’ All Girl Talent Showcase at the Lincoln Theatre on October 15, 2022 now therefore; 
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council does hereby recognize ICE Mentors for its Eryn PiNK Girl Empowerment program and celebrate October 11, 2022 as the International Day of the Girl in the City of Columbus.
